creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: black and white image; photograph of a fragmented sheet that consists of 16 individual sheets attached in a grid to form an image of a standing figure wearing white clothing and a white headpiece in C; figure is "cracked" and fragmented, in which black passages with sharp edges obscure face, abdomen and PR arm, knees and a portion of legs; same fragment/ cracked pattern repeat in background at T quadrants; trees on L; two barrels in LRQ; overall sheet is pinned to a background, with pins in URC and ULC; medium wood frame
inscription: LLC, verso: Gallery label for Ryan Lee Gallery
title: Fragment: Military Officer (from Alexander Schadenberg photographs of the Philippines, circa 1881-1896, National Anthropology Archives, NAA.PhotoLot.15)
